unnormalised: Borem, mhunnllear tumi Bhartantle raste jinkhunk sodhtat, ho? Dhirachem monis! Mhaka sangonk di, tem ek sohod'drek. Ek khorem, yogya sohod'drek. Tumkam dista tumkam road trips kollttaat mhunn, punn Delhi saun Jaipur-ak driving korop, udharonnak, ekdum veglli game aasa. 250 km sambhavye asvavasthechem chintun gheiat, kiteak tem dusrea soodhea shant highway-chea tukddeanchea modim dishta. Google Maps sangta tumkam 4 voram lagtolli, punn satyam sangonk mhunnllear, atlean 2 voram tea chayechea break-anchea khatir, gai cross korpak, ani nirdharit “detour” gaanvchea bazaar-antlean zavonk.
normalised: Bore, tumi Bharoti rosteancher zoit zoddunk chint’tai, hã? Dhadoshi monis! Hanv tumkam sangtam, tem ek bhonvddi. Ek khorem, yogi bhonvddi. Tumi rosteanchea bhonvddear vixim zannam mhonn chintunk xakta, punn Delhi-thavn Jaipurak choloun vhorop, udharonnakhatir, ekdom vegllem khell asa. Don xe ani ponchvis kilometer samanya asaunchea dhondallicho vichar kora, modhem-modhem xant highwayacho vatavo. Google Maps sangta tumkam char horam lagtele, punn khorench, atleat don horam odik chai-chi susti, gavanchi add-vaat, ani anivaraya "vhalli" ganvanchea bazaracho thorun ghetat.

unnormalised: Ani gaddyeo! Tumchea fancy imported SUVs-ank visarun vcha. Khore Bhartantle rastyachea razak “Horn OK Please” mhunn tallele truck-a asat. Tim tumkam defensive driving shikovtolli tumkam avoddo vo naavoddo. Magir auto-rickshaw aasa, nirdhayponean traffic-antlean bhonvtaat zoso tim zivit video game khelttaat. Ho, ani buses visarunk naka... khas korun state transport buses. Tea sundarank, mhunnllear Mumbai saun Pune-ak ₹300-ank, ek guaranteed rollercoaster aasa!
normalised: Ani gaddiyo! Tumi apnna fancy import kel’le S-U-Vs visrun zatat. Bharoti rosteancher khore raza zauncheo Bharillea truckacher “Horn O-K Please” ubharlea. Te tumkam defensive choloun vhorunk xikounk zatole tumi dhoronnan vo na. Magir auto-rickshaws asa, bhirant nastana traffic modlean vota, khorea jivitant video game khellta mhonnun. Oh, ani bus-ak visrunko naka… khas korun rajy transportache. Eke sundor bus-icher bhonvddi, udharonnakhatir Mumbai-thavn Pune-ak sumar tin xe rupiyankhatir, ek nischit rollercoaster asa!

unnormalised: Tea khatir, buckle korun gheiat, kaim Bollywood-chim geet download korat (jaruri!), ani tumchea jivitantlea ride-ak toyar ravat. Fakt yad dovrat, sambhal tumcho ut'tom ixtt, ek borem horn khub gorjechem, ani ek borea humor-acho bhav sampurnn mahatvacho. Ho, ani kaim antacids pack korat. Tum maka uprant dhanyavaad ditole. Borem bhonvddek, yaar!
normalised: Tea khatir, pati bandun ghea, kainch Bollywood gitam download kara (lavpache!), ani jivitache bhonvddek toyar zata. Fokot gurt dhori, dhir tumcho ut’tom ixtt, boro horn gorjecho asa, ani ek bori hasyachi bhavna ekdom gorjechi. Oh, ani kainch antacids gheun vocha. Tumi magir mhaka dhanyavad ditole. Surakshit bhonvddi, yaar!
